summary: Completed comprehensive testing of HR Platform with multi-language, multi-currency, and multi-corporate features. Backend APIs achieved 100% success rate (71/71 tests passed). Frontend testing confirmed all core functionality including authentication, CRUD operations, language switching, RTL support, and currency management.
passed_tests: User registration and login with JWT authentication
Dashboard stats display (corporations, branches, employees, pending leaves)
Corporation CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Branch CRUD operations with multi-level hierarchy support
Employee CRUD operations with salary and currency fields
Multi-language support (English, Spanish, French, German, Arabic, Chinese)
API integration between frontend and backend
